# Publishers.TryContainsWhere.Failure

**Type Alias**

The kind of errors this publisher might publish.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Failure = Error
```

## Discussion

This publisher produces the Swift [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/Error] type.

## Declaring supporting types

- **Publishers.TryContainsWhere.Output**: The kind of values published by this publisher.
